original_text: Solomon had places to keep 4,000 horses that pulled his chariots. He also had 12,000 horses. He kept them in the cities that he had chosen for this and also in Jerusalem where he lived.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 병거 메는 말의 외양간은 사천이요 마병은 만 이천 명이라 병거성에도 두고 예루살렘 왕에게도 두었으며

sentences.original_text: Solomon had places to keep 4,000 horses
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 4,000마리의 말을 지킬 장소를 가지고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: He kept them in the cities
that he had chosen for this
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 이를 위해 선택한 도시들이었고

sentences.original_text: and also in Jerusalem where he lived
